page.shortlink: api a5 storage save data function
page.description: Saves data to storage, including saving files to Amazon S3 or Azure. Same as a5Storage_saveFile(), except takes a blob as input rather than a filename.
page.prototype: L a5Storage_saveData(C connectionString ,b blob ,C itemName [,C mimeType [,* pResult ]])

argument.name: connectionString
argument.description: Character. Storage connection string with ::storage:: as a prefix.

argument.name: blob
argument.description: name of the blob to save in storage.

argument.name: itemName
argument.description: Character. name of the object in storage. You can can specify a logical folder by using forward slashes in the name. For example: image/image1.jpg

argument.name: mimeType
argument.description: Character. the mime type of the object. If you don't specify this property, the value can be inferred from the extension you assign to the itemName property.

argument.name: pResult
argument.description: * An optional dot variable that you can pass in that will be populated with information about the object.
